interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Precision Clean Oral-B Vitality Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush
Review Date: 2009/10/17
Store: Oral-B
Product Description: ['ORAL-B" ULTRA PLAK CONTROL REMOVER Ultra-speed oscillating brushing action Cleans better than manual toothbrush Removes heavy plaque build- up and stains Unique cup shaped brush head surrounds each tooth Interdental tips penetrate deep between teeth and along the gum line "Indicator" bristles fade halfway to signal when to replace brush head for optimal performance Ergonomic handle Lasts 7 days between charges Includes 1 brush head Replacement brush head Ace No. 6012678 White with turquoise accent Blister pack']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Oral-B', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Special Feature': 'Brushing Timer', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric, Battery Powered', 'Color': 'Blue', 'Product Dimensions': '4.33 x 9.45 x 2.05 inches; 10.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Oral B Vitality Presision Clean - D12513', 'UPC': '069055816127 069055838440', 'Manufacturer': 'Oral-B'}
Review Text: My family has used Oral B rechargeable toothbrushes for years.  We end up replacing them after about 3 years or so, but, at a price under $20 each, it still is cheaper than a Sonicare.  The replacement head brushes are about the same price as the more expenseive rechargeables, and we purchase them at Sam's and on line.  And, in the end, the results are what matter.  No one in our family has had a cavity in over 7 years.  Some of that has to be the results of a good toothbrushing (especially with my children).
Review Title: Great Product. Great Price. Great Results.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

['ORAL-B" ULTRA PLAK CONTROL REMOVER Ultra-speed oscillating brushing action Cleans better than manual toothbrush Removes heavy plaque build- up and stains Unique cup shaped brush head surrounds each tooth Interdental tips penetrate deep between teeth and along the gum line "Indicator" bristles fade halfway to signal when to replace brush head for optimal performance Ergonomic handle Lasts 7 days between charges Includes 1 brush head Replacement brush head Ace No. 6012678 White with turquoise accent Blister pack']
{'Brand': 'Oral-B', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Special Feature': 'Brushing Timer', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric, Battery Powered', 'Color': 'Blue', 'Product Dimensions': '4.33 x 9.45 x 2.05 inches; 10.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Oral B Vitality Presision Clean - D12513', 'UPC': '069055816127 069055838440', 'Manufacturer': 'Oral-B'}
My family has used Oral B rechargeable toothbrushes for years.  We end up replacing them after about 3 years or so, but, at a price under $20 each, it still is cheaper than a Sonicare.  The replacement head brushes are about the same price as the more expenseive rechargeables, and we purchase them at Sam's and on line.  And, in the end, the results are what matter.  No one in our family has had a cavity in over 7 years.  Some of that has to be the results of a good toothbrushing (especially with my children).
Great Product. Great Price. Great Results.
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: Strong preference for rechargeable electric toothbrushes, particularly from Oral-B.
- **Value Sensitivity**: Prioritizes cost-effectiveness, finding products that perform well at lower price points compared to premium competitors. 
- **Family-Centric**: Emphasizes family health, noting a long-term commitment to dental care for all family members, particularly children.
- **Performance Focus**: Values product effectiveness; highlights results such as cavity prevention as a key indicator of satisfaction. 
- **Longevity and Maintenance**: Familiar with product life cycles, indicating a practical approach to replacements and maintenance. Prefers easily accessible replacement options.
- **Shopping Habits**: Utilizes both in-store (like Sam's) and online shopping for convenience and to find better deals.
- **Consistency in Quality**: Has been a loyal user of Oral-B products over time, suggesting trust in the brand’s quality and effectiveness. 
- **Overall Satisfaction**: Expresses high satisfaction with product performance and pricing, ensuring health outcomes for the family. 

This summary reflects the user's genuine preferences and behaviors based on their interaction, indicating a strong inclination towards reliable, cost-effective dental care solutions for the family.
